ja477:9.1: paṭisevittho → patisevittho (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | paṭisevittha (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja477:9.3: Paṅke ca mā visīdittho → paṅko ca mā visiyittho (mr)
ja477:11.4: sādu → madhu (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed), khuddarasūpamo → ... rasūpamā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja477:18.1: kirāṭañca → kirāsañca (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | kirāsaṃ vā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
